name: Shivanshi
greetingText: I wanted to create something special in an engineer's style, so here it is hope you'll like it !
wishText: All the best for your exams and an unforgettable year ahead. I am sure they will be good ! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy returns of the day blah blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: I know that you won't see this page again so just putting things that I wanted to say to you here. I saw you for the first time in rikshaw and my life stopped. We have been talking from last 10 years but still I couldn't even get into the list of your friends. I am not fortunate enough to be your friend :(
replayText: Looks like I have now lost too much of my self respect but this is a major problem with me I don't want to lose the bonds I have and I keep trying to do everything to keep that. I used to think that if I keep trying one day you would recognise but I lost. I really wished you could have given me just one chance I would have brought down the entire world for you.  !
